posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anthony Buzzi
Looking for an Old Judge of this great old Phillie.  I hear he is fairly common but darn if I can find one.  Looking for one in decent shape but nothing crazy.  SGC 2, 3 or four would do the trick.

Posted By: bigfish
Tony,

There is a Ferguson on ebay right now.  I know you want this card and hope you get it.
